just search for “giving the player” without " " in player.java

item.title: Starter doesn't work?
item.dc:creator: @SivanScape SivanScape
item.description:
@SivanScape wrote:

i got devolution and i want people when they start that they are wearing full iron
power ammy and scimmy and orange cape and leather boots.

so i wen’t to player.java i founded this

public int playerHat = 0;
public int playerCape = 1;
public int playerAmulet = 2;
public int playerWeapon = 3;
public int playerChest = 4;
public int playerShield = 5;
public int playerLegs = 7;
public int playerHands = 9;
public int playerFeet = 10;
public int playerRing = 12;
public int playerArrows = 13;

i changend it to the items i wanted like u do normally
i compile no error i run server it won’t let u in i fixed it again to that what up there
and it worked again how can i make people wear stuff when they start?
